title: Chinese chicken and sweetcorn soup
ingredients: ['225g skinless, boneless chicken breast meat, finely chopped or pulsed in a food processor', '1 tablespoon sherry', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 egg whites', '1 (375g) tin creamed style corn', '1 litre chicken stock', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '4 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '4 rashers streaky bacon, cooked until crisp and crumbled']
